item.title: Resources for Spiritual Growth
item.description:
Books

  • The Unseen Realm (Michael Heiser)
  • description * Available on drive.

Blogs

  • Eric Hyde Topical … modern worldview issues from an Orthodox perspective.
  • David Bentley Hart https://davidbentleyhart.substack.com/
  • Wesley Huff https://www.wesleyhuff.com/blog New Testament canonization, reliability.
  • The Symbolic World https://www.thesymbolicworld.com/content-categories/articles Miscellaneous Orthodox perspective.
  • Worldview Bulletin https://worldviewbulletin.substack.com/archive Miscellaneous.
  • Salvation for all https://salvationforall.org/ Universalism capsule.
  • Cal Crucis https://substack.com/@calcrucis/posts

Sermons Abraham and the Torch – Timothy Keller [Sermon] A typological exegesis of the gospel in God’s covenant with Abraham.
